process_colorbox ( $  ProcessingString,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'colorbox'.

Parameters:
$ProcessingString - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
Processed string.
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 160 of file colorbox.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( 
                              $ProcessingString , 'colorbox' , array( 'selector' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; 
                        )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              
                              $TemplatePath = dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/colorbox.tpl';
                              $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $TemplatePath );
                              
                              $Selector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{selector}' , $Selector , $Template );
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{colorbox:$MacroParameters}" , $Template , $ProcessingString );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
